subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: If the Devils win the Stanley Cup, Adam Henrique just might be named the playoffs’ most valuable player. But first New Jersey must come back from a 3-1 deficit against Los Angeles.
snippet: If the Devils win the Stanley Cup, Adam Henrique just might be named the playoffs’ most valuable player. But first New Jersey must come back from a 3-1 deficit against Los Angeles.
